synthesis_conditions.procedure: Melamine and cyanuric acid solutions were mixed and aged for 24 hours. Silver nitrate solution was added and the mixture was aged for two days in a dark closet at room temperature. Ammonia solution was added and the mixture was aged for another two days. The hydrogel-membrane was then dried at 60 ˚C.

characterization_methods.details: Coated by gold, operated at 5 kV. BSE and EDS mapping at 7 kV with carbon coating.
Rigaku Smartlab, Cu Kα radiation, 40 mA and 40 kV, resolution of 0.01° (2θ).
Kratos Axis Ultra, mono Al Kα (1486.6 eV) X-ray.
Nicolet iS50 FTIR spectrometer, resolution of 4 cm-1.
MX2 beamline at the Australian Synchrotron, λ = 0.7108 Å, T = 100K.
Hysitron TI 950 Nanoidentor, Berkovich indenter, Oliver-Pharr method.
MTS Tytron 250 tensile tester, loading rate at 0.01mm/s.
Nanoindentation, conical indenter with a tip radius of 1 µm.
